title: The Singing Salesman: The Adventures of Oscar Jones

story.text: Oscar Jones, a talented singer and salesman, discovers a mysterious amulet in a box of unsold merchandise. The amulet starts to glow when he sings notes at certain pitches.
Experimenting with the amulet, Oscar realizes that singing specific tunes can manipulate objects. Intrigued, he decides to study the amulet further after work.
At a local karaoke bar, whilst singing, Oscar accidentally triggers the amulet’s power, sending a shockwave across the room. This attracts the attention of a curious scientist in the audience.
The scientist introduces herself as Dr. Elara Myles, who offers to help Oscar understand the amulet’s technology. They spend hours in her lab, discovering its origins as an ancient alien artifact.
Using the amulet, Oscar prevents a robbery by controlling the robbers' getaway car with his voice, steering it safely away into the police's hands.
News of Oscar’s heroics spreads. He chooses to use his new powers for good, balancing life as a singer-salesman by day, and a superhero by night.
Oscar offers a benefit concert, using his singing both to entertain and subtly use his powers to help those in need. Dr. Myles assures him that the amulet's secrets are safe with her.

ending: As the curtain falls, Oscar learned that even an ordinary day could turn into the start of an extraordinary journey.
moral: Every talent, combined with a curious heart, can be a source of great power and responsibility.
